module: Module-level comment: The AudioPLL module generates a synchronized audio clock from a reference clock using the `audio_pll_0` submodule. It accepts a reference clock (`ref_clk_clk`) and reset (`ref_reset_reset`) as inputs, generating an audio clock (`audio_clk_clk`) and a synchronized reset output (`reset_source_reset`). This implementation directly connects input ports to corresponding outputs through `audio_pll_0`, ensuring streamlined processing and signal integrity.
